strings.evolution:
Well, this is interesting.
I seem to have awakened as a mage. The body of a vision is quite the marvel.
strings.affinity:
We've had a long association.
I've learned many things thanks to you. Here is a token of my appreciation.
strings.description: A black mage who conducted magical research in an enchanted forest. Tronn's eschewal of human contact in favor of such work slowly drew him to the dark side of magic, to which he ultimately lost his life. His uncompromising thirst for arcane knowledge lives on as a vision that can, at last, control the dark powers he so coveted in life.
strings.fusion:
Hmmm... Is this new power I feel?
This must be how visions grow stronger.
strings.summon:
I have indeed returned as a vision.
As a researcher of magic,
I find this puzzling, but...
Anyway, use my magic wisely.

strings.description: A black mage who secluded himself in an enchanted forest, avoiding all human contact and devoting himself to magical research. His thirst for knowledge and insistent shunning of others eventually transformed his earnest studies into a quest for power. Ultimately, Tronn failed to control the magic he had learned, which tragically cost him his life.
strings.fusion:
Is this a new form of magic?
It seems my powers have been enhanced.
Best use them wisely.
strings.summon:
Am I...? This body...
I must be a legendary vision now.
If you are in need of my magic,
feel free to use it.
